meaningMnemonic: You climb up a <radical>mountain</radical> and a <radical>cliff</radical> in search of <radical>fire</radical>, but all you find is <kanji>charcoal</kanji>. You can make fire with the charcoal, but you were hoping to find fire itself. All that climbing for nothing.
readingMnemonic: After crushing the <kanji>charcoal</kanji>, you decide to take advantage of your current location and lie out in the sun for a while to get a <reading>tan</reading> (たん). Instead of getting a tan though, you catch on fire. Oops.
